The video was published on Facebook on J: 2019, with an Indonesian-language caption that translates to English as the claim of a new national anthem in Mandarin for Indonesia.
The 3: minute, 37-second clip shows a music video for a Chinese song, displaying lyrics in both Indonesian and Chinese subtitles.
The same music video has been shared on: 4. The claim is false; the song in the music video is a Chinese-language version of an Indonesian patriotic song originally titled "Jayalah Indonesiaku" and has been circulating online since at least 2012.
